about_the_game:
SVFI - Advanced-GPU Optimization Pack

- Provide essential support for NVIDIA GPUs above the Ampere structure.

- Uninstall this DLC If the speed is slowed down after installation.
detailed_description:
SVFI - Advanced-GPU Optimization Pack

- Provide essential support for NVIDIA GPUs above the Ampere structure.

- Uninstall this DLC If the speed is slowed down after installation.

name: SVFI - Advanced-GPU Optimization Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, 1.5+ GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® RTX® 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: AMD® 3990WX
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® RTX® Blackwell or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: SVFI - Advanced-GPU Optimization Pack. Provide essential support for NVIDIA GPUs above the Ampere structure.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
